messages.noExamsSelected: Please select from the assessments above
messages.upload-in-progress: Files are still uploading, are you sure you want to leave?

access-denied.title: Access Denied
access-denied.message: Your user account does not have access to use this application. If you believe you have reached this page in error, please contact your administrator.

groups.title: Manage Student Groups
groups.no-results: No groups found matching the given filter criteria.
groups.no-schools: Your user account does not have access to view the groups of any schools.

delete.title: Delete {{name}}?
delete.content-html:
When a group is deleted, it is no longer available to any users. This action cannot be undone.

Are you sure you would like to continue?

import.title: Upload New or Revised Groups
import.empty: Upload results will be shown here.
import.replacement-instruct: To make changes to an existing group, please upload a replacement file.
import.drag-instruct: Drag and drop to upload or
import.warning-html:
WARNING: Groups in the uploaded file will replace existing groups if they have the same school ID, school year and group name.

All other groups will not be deleted or changed.

rules.body-html:
1. The CSV file must include the headers found in the template file provided below.
  2. Every row must include a valid school_natural_id, school_year, and group_name.
  3. Groups for a particular school must be listed together and must not be separated by lists of groups for other schools.
  4. Groups must be listed together and not separated by rows of other groups.
  5. A group's subject must be listed as Math, ELA or All.
  6. There is a limit of 200 students that may be assigned to a single group.
  7. A user must have the GROUP_ADMIN role for a school in order to upload groups.

instructional-resource.no-results: No instructional resources found matching the given filter criteria.
instructional-resource.title: Manage Instructional Resources

create.title: Create Instructional Resource
create.error: Unable to create an Instructional Resource.
create.duplicate: An Instructional Resource for this assessment, organization, and performance level already exists.

delete.title: Delete Instructional Resource
delete.warning: WARNING: Deleting this resource cannot be undone.

Individual.State-true: Currently the individual Summative test results for the state of {{stateName}} are embargoed.
Individual.State-false: Currently the individual Summative test results for the state of {{stateName}} are released.

Aggregate.State-true: Currently the aggregate Summative test results for the state of {{stateName}} are embargoed.
Aggregate.State-false: Currently the aggregate Summative test results for the state of {{stateName}} are released.

Individual.State-true: Completing this action will withdrawal {{resultCount}} individual Summative test results. This setting can be overridden by individual districts that choose to release their results.
Individual.State-false: Completing this action will release {{resultCount}} individual Summative test results.

Aggregate.State-true: Completing this action will prevent users from viewing aggregate data for {{resultCount}} Summative test results.
Aggregate.State-false: Completing this action will allow users to view aggregate data for {{resultCount}} Summative test results.

State-true.District-true: Completing this action result in the {{resultCount}} individual Summative test results of {{organizationName}} being released when the state releases individual Summative test results.
State-true.District-false: Do you want to override this setting and release {{resultCount}} individual Summative test results for {{organizationName}}?

State-false.District-true: Completing this action will have no immediate effect. However, in the event that the state of {{stateName}} re-embargoes individual Summative test results, the {{resultCount}} individual Summative test results of {{organizationName}} will be embargoed.
State-false.District-false: Completing this action will have no immediate effect. However, in the event that the state of {{stateName}} re-embargoes individual Summative test results, the {{resultCount}} individual Summative test results of {{organizationName}} will remain released.

State-true.District-true: Completing this action result in the {{resultCount}} aggregate Summative test results of {{organizationName}} being released when the state releases aggregate Summative test results.
State-true.District-false: Do you want to override this setting and release {{resultCount}} aggregate Summative test results for {{organizationName}}?

State-false.District-true: Completing this action will have no immediate effect. However, in the event that the state of {{stateName}} re-embargoes aggregate Summative test results, the {{resultCount}} aggregate Summative test results of {{organizationName}} will be embargoed.
State-false.District-false: Completing this action will have no immediate effect. However, in the event that the state of {{stateName}} re-embargoes aggregate Summative test results, the {{resultCount}} aggregate Summative test results of {{organizationName}} will remain released.
